title: Random Password Generator
author: ankitpati
content: readme.md random password generatorgenerate long strong passwords.kickstartgit clone https://github.com/ankitpati/rpg.gitcd rpg./rpginstallation install binary the current user, && make install install binary all users (requires root), && sudo installsamplesplace binary your path easier access. refer installation.rpg # defaults between 8 16 charactersrpg 100 # 100 charactersrpg 50 100 # between 50 100 charactersrpg 50 100 43 # generate 43 passwordsrpg 50 50 43 # 43 passwords 50 characters each
